description: The tool provides guidance for resolving the unexpected appearance of the app search bar above the message list in Outlook. It is accessible through Microsoft's support page, where users can find detailed steps or updates related to this issue. Users can follow troubleshooting practices to address this UI inconsistency, which might engage different configurations or settings specific to their Outlook environment. Refer to the Microsoft support page for comprehensive troubleshooting instructions and solutions relevant to specific build numbers or updates that might influence Outlook's behavior.
